entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: I have decided to move all of my guides to Github Pages! This allows me more control over my content and makes it a lot easier to keep guides up to date!
entry.content:
I have decided to move all of my guides to Github Pages! This allows me more control over my content and makes it a lot easier to keep guides up to date!

I plan to have quite a bit of content on:

  1. General Linux & Windows guides
  2. Blockchains like Autonomys and Spacemesh
  3. COMET
  4. And more!
